attributes.action: Prescriptions for Mental Health medication to be made free in England.
attributes.additional_details: In today’s contemporary society, mental health disorders have significantly risen and more people are becoming medicated for it. People should not have to pay for medication that allows them to live a relatively normal life. Prescriptions for mental health in Scotland and Wales are free, why should England be an exception.
attributes.background: Make prescriptions free for those on medication for mental health disorders that are over the age of 18.
